import React from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { NavLink, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { removeFromCart } from "../../redux/features/cartSlice"; import "../../styles/Header/Header.css"; import Upperbar from "../Upperbar/Upperbar"; function Header() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { cartItems } = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const { favoriteItems } = useSelector((state) => state.favorite); const handleRemoveFromCart = (item) => { dispatch(removeFromCart(item)); }; const handleClassName = (e) => { e.target.parentElement.children[2].classList.toggle("toggle"); }; const navigateToCart = () => { navigate("/features"); }; return ( <>
